A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like:
I created this account just to leave this review.
I genuinely cannot understand the hate this film is getting.

Some seem to think it is PC propaganda. While not being a fan of PC (to put it lightly)\, I simply cannot see how this is the case.

Others seem upset that their own fan-fiction and predictions are wrong. This is almost always the case anyway.

I really enjoyed this film and thoroughly recommend it.
